sub_title: Sustainability Advisor | ESG Reporting | Corporate Sustainability | Risk Management | ESG Due-Diligence #I help organizations identify and mitigate risks and maximize opportunities in their sustainability transition#
summary: I am a sustainability expert keen on helping organizations incorporate Environmental, Social and Governance (ESG) considerations in their core strategy, operations and processes to meet sustainability goals, comply with legislation, manage risks and strengthen stakeholder relations. My expertise includes ESG and Sustainability Reporting, ESG Due Diligence, Risk Management, Knowledge Development, Project Management, Stakeholder Engagement and Business Development. I enjoy generating new ideas and solutions, creating business cases and thought leadership content and providing advisory & solutions to address contemporary societal challenges associated with climate change and sustainable development.

profile_positions.description:
	Manage ESG reporting, human rights and sustainable finance projects for agri-food, banking and finance clients and provide advisory.
	Develop ESG strategies and translate them into roadmaps, create business cases, set KPIs, ESG Framework and advise clients on how to comply with legislation and meet stakeholder demands.
	Conduct materiality assessments, Impact measurement, and ESG due diligence to identify risks, challenges and opportunities in clients' operations and supply chains, design risk management strategies, and environmental & social action plans.
	Research trends in the ESG landscape such as the EU Taxonomy, CSDR, EFRAG, SFRD, CSDDD, and Human Rights Due-Diligence in the Supply Chain and develop thought leadership content.
	Develop Sustainability/ESG reporting and Sustainable Finance product offerings and playbooks to improve the practice's visibility.
	Create and disseminate sustainability learning content and certifications to up-skill staff members through self-paced courses, webinars, workshops, and training. 
	Build and maintain relationships with stakeholders by networking and representing the organization at conferences and industry events.
	Engage with stakeholders like the Chief Sustainability Officers' office to benchmark our ESG performance against standards and rating agencies and client partners to support the filling of RFPs.
	Organize Diversity, Equity and Inclusion events to foster a conducive working environment.
profile_positions.title: Manager: Sustainability Advisor

profile_positions.description:
As an independent consultant, I lead and work on projects on gender, human rights, and climate change issues in the financial, food, agriculture, and livestock sectors. 
I conduct research, develop capacity-building products, engage stakeholders, and deliver training to diverse audiences. Provide technical support by:
	Reviewing scientific and non-scientific literature, policy documents and develop training and communication products.
	Disseminating findings by conducting training, workshops, webinars, and seminars 
	Engaging stakeholders to develop theory of change and do materiality assessments
	Preparing for and implementing Gender Mainstreaming in strategies, programs, and project life cycle 

Some clients I have engaged include: -
	The Consortium of International Agricultural Research Centres (CGIAR) – CGIAR GENDER Platform
	The African Development Bank through NIRAS International – Gender Transformative Climate Change Adaptation Approaches
	Alliance for a Green Revolution for Africa (AGRA) 
	United Nations Development Programme (UNDP)
	Food and Agricultural Organization (FAO)
profile_positions.title: Founder - Sustainability Consultant (Climate Change, Human Rights and Gender-Equality)

profile_positions.description:
The Institute of Development Studies (IDS) is a development think tank that delivers world-class research, consultancies, and learning, transforming the knowledge and leadership needed for more equitable and sustainable global development.

	Managed projects from problem definition, planning and budgeting resources, recruiting and supervising research assistants, executing and monitoring progress and handing over deliverables.
	Conducted sustainability research on agriculture and finance sectors by executing robust research design, recruiting participants collecting, analysing and visualizing sustainability data, and visualising and disseminating output to diverse audiences. 
	Performed environmental and social impacts assessment, climate risk analysis and human rights/ ESG Due- diligence in clients’ operations and supply chains, formulated environmental and social action plans (ESAPs) and provided advisory.
	Engaged various stakeholders to develop and deliver the sustainability, climate change and gender equality course content, tutor students, and assess assignments to meet the learning agenda.
	Analyzed IDS's ESG performance, identified gaps, wrote management plans and supported implementation.
	Created and published articles, blogs, and policy briefs, presented on various platforms, and 
        organized sustainability and climate events like symposiums, conferences, webinars, etc.
profile_positions.title: Sustainability and Environmental Change Researcher

company.name: Tufts University - The Fletcher School of Law and Diplomacy

profile_positions.company: The Fletcher School at Tufts University
profile_positions.description:
The Climate Policy Lab at the Center for International Environmental and Research Policy (CIERP) is an interdisciplinary research centre devoted to researching sustainable development.

	Researched in a UNDP-commissioned project on additionality in climate adaptation finance.
	Contributed to the lab's inquiries on climate finance strategies and published policy briefs. 
	Interviewed applicants, graded scholarship applications and wrote admissions reports. 
	Audited sustainable development diplomacy and processes of international negotiations
profile_positions.title: Visiting Climate Change Scholar

profile_positions.description:
	Synthesised the opportunities, trade-offs, and synergy in the Nexus of the SDGs of (2) Zero 
         Hunger, (3) Health & Wellbeing and (9) Industry, Innovation, and infrastructure. 
	Wrote a synthesis report that fed into the high political forum of 2017.
	Published a policy brief on nanotechnology in agricultural production.
profile_positions.title: Sustainability Consultant

profile_positions.description:
The Co-operative Bank of Kenya is one of the largest commercial banks in Kenya that serves the banking needs of individuals, small businesses, large corporations, and cooperative societies.

	Conducted environmental and social due diligence using the IFC performance 
         standards, UN guiding principles on business and human rights and Equator Principles
	Developed environmental and social action plans (ESAP) using the environmental and social management system (ESMS) framework
	Led the corporate social responsibility (environmental and social) initiatives across the bank's network
	Co-developed the bank's group's lending model, which targeted the “un-bankable.” 
         Populations and trained microcredit officers across the banks' network.
	Managed business loans by recruiting clients, analysed their credit applications, facilitated loan disbursement, ensured prompt repayment and managed client relationships post-disbursement.     
	Managed customer relationships and ensured they adhered to the financial,        
         environmental, and social requirements post-loan disbursement.
	Conducted bi-weekly training by identifying gaps, organising, and facilitating the 
         training.
	Fostered an excellent internal client culture and analysed the root cause of customer 
          issues with the aim of addressing and de-escalating complaints.
profile_positions.title: Business Development/Business Banker (Formally Micro Credit)

            • Accountability in International Arenas for Development

volunteer_experiences.role: European Conference on African Studies organizing volunteer

•	Registration of delegates (1,500), distributing signage, ushering, and providing information
